Question 1.Question: How would you ask, 'How many students do you have?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 你有什么笔？ (Nǐ yǒu shén me bǐ?)
Options.B: 你有几个学生？ (Nǐ yǒu jǐ gè xuéshēng?) - Correct Answer
Options.D: 你有几支笔？ (Nǐ yǒu jǐ zhī bǐ?)

Question 2.Question: Which of the following is the Chinese phrase for 'elementary school'?

Question 3.Question: How do you ask, 'What kind of pen do you have?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 你有什么笔 (Nǐ yǒu shén me bǐ) - Correct Answer
Options.B: 你有几支笔 (Nǐ yǒu jǐ zhī bǐ)
Options.C: 你有几本书 (Nǐ yǒu jǐ běn shū)

Question 4.Question: How would you say, 'My books are very few in number' in Chinese?

Options.A: 我的书数量非常多 (Wǒ de shū shù liàng fēicháng duō)
Options.B: 我的书数量很少 (Wǒ de shū shù liàng hěn shǎo) - Correct Answer
Options.C: 我有多少本书？ (Wǒ yǒu duōshǎo běn shū?)
Options.D: 我的书在学校里找不到 (Wǒ de shū zài xuéxiàolǐ zhǎobúdào)

Question 5.Question: What is the Chinese phrase for 'How many books does Mr. Wang have?'

Options.A: 你有多少本书？ (Nǐ yǒu duōshǎo běn shū?)
Options.B: 王先生有多少本书？ (Wáng xiānsheng yǒu duōshǎo běn shū?) - Correct Answer
Options.C: 这所学校真的很大。 (Zhè suǒ xuéxiào zhēnde hěndà.)
Options.D: 王小姐真的很忙。 (Wáng xiǎojiě zhēnde hěnmáng.)

Question 6.Question: How would you say, 'This school is very big, isn't it?' in Chinese?

Options.C: 这所学校真的很大 (Zhè suǒ xué xiào zhēnde hěndà) - Correct Answer
Options.D: 不，我没有书 (Bù, wǒ méiyǒu shū)

Question 7.Question: How would you ask, 'What kind of pen do you have?' in Chinese?

Options.A: 你用什么样的笔写字？ (Nǐ yòng shénmeyàng de bǐ xiězì?) - Correct Answer
Options.B: 我用铅笔写字。 (Wǒ yòng qiānbǐ xiězì.)
Options.C: 他也很聪明，也很勤奋。 (Tā yě hěn cōng míng, yě hěn qín fèn.)
Options.D: 你有几个学生？ (Nǐ yǒu jǐ gè xuéshēng?)

Question 8.Question: What does '孩子们比成年人更努力' (Hái zi men bǐ chéng nián rén gèng nǔ lì) mean?

Options.A: The children are lazier than adults.
Options.B: The children work even harder than adults. - Correct Answer

Question 9.Question: How do you ask, 'Are you going or am I?' in Chinese?

Options.B: 你是去还是我 (Nǐ shì qù hái shì wǒ) - Correct Answer
Options.C: 我的学生非常努力 (Wǒ de xuéshēng fēicháng nǔ lì)
Options.D: 他真的很愚蠢 (Tā zhēndehěn yúchǔn)

Question 10.Question: What does 'May I ask your name?' mean in Chinese?

Options.A: 你的名字是什么？ (Nǐ de míngzì shì shénme) - Correct Answer
Options.D: 他要我干什么？(Tā yào wǒ gàn shén me)

Question 11.Question: How do you say 'Please introduce us to each other' in Chinese?

Options.A: 请问你有没有笔？(Qǐngwèn nǐ yǒu méiyǒu bǐ?)
Options.B: 让我互相介绍一下。(Ràng wǒ hùxiāng jièshào yīxià.) - Correct Answer
Options.C: 我也不认识他。(Wǒ yě bù rènshí tā.)
Options.D: 他给了我一本书。(Tā gěile wǒ yī běn shū.)

Question 12.Question: What does '他要我干什么?' (Tā yào wǒ gànshénme) mean?

Options.A: What does he want from me? - Correct Answer
Options.C: May I ask if you have a pen?

Question 13.Question: Which phrase means 'I have already studied for a year'?

Options.A: 我刚学习了两个月 (Wǒ gāng xuéxíle liǎng gè yuè)
Options.B: 我还没学 (Wǒ hái méi xué)
Options.C: 我已经学习了一年 (Wǒ yǐjīng xuéxíle yī nián) - Correct Answer
Options.D: 我不会去有关系吗？(Wǒ bù huì qù yǒu guānxì ma?)

Question 14.Question: What does '他已经在这里待了五个月' (Tā yǐjīng zài zhèlǐ dàile wǔ gè yuè) imply?

Options.A: He has been here for five minutes.
Options.B: He has been here for five hours.
Options.C: He has been here for five days.
Options.D: He has been here for five months. - Correct Answer

Question 15.Question: What is the English translation of '我们已经见过面了'? (Wǒmen yǐjīng jiànguò miànle)

Options.A: We have already seen a movie.
Options.B: We have already met each other. - Correct Answer
